title: Uplift/Future assets should be considered as alpha
message: All "Uplift" and "Future" assests should be considered experimental, are not yet fully supported, and are subject to change.

title: Token dist path has changed
message: As of v{versionNotifyStart}, token paths in the dist directory have changed from From "/dist/tokens/" to "/dist/theme-*/tokens/". The old path will be removed in v{versionNotifyEnd}.
